Subject: Different device control rules for a subset of devices
Description:
I have used Global access, device section to disable removable media. 
I now realize that I need removable media only disabled on a subset of machines. 
How shall I apply the blockage of removable media so that I can only apply it to a subgroup of laptops where I want to enforce this policy?

Thanks for your help
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer asked about the Device control rights for groups of computers/users.
They were able to set this up bases on the instructions they got.
